channel.title: [SFoL] SFoL 55: Old Ruins FoL - Completed (3/16)
channel.description:
# Welcome to SFoL - Old Ruins! Host is @WazzaAzza/Other Host or Co-Host is @Geyde
## Rules
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not quote private host messages 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 6. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. 7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 8. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join a forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 9. Lets all have fun and play together! 10. Do not edit or delete made posts. 11. Do not like posts in a thread if you are dead in that game.
## Gameplay
* Days last 72 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 24 hours. * All actions must be sent to the mod. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * The priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server or forum message. * All classes will be used and will be used as the randomizer suggests. * All the classes that are rolled will be rolled like normal, additionally after that the date for that classes period will be rolled to determine what roll the class shall be created from.
## Executions
* To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]” * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be put on trial where they will have up to 6 hours to post a defense. Afterwards you all have 12 hours to decide their fate or 3 hours if the trial has extended the day.
## Picking a New King
* If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * When the king dies a 12 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Action Results
I'd post a feedback list, but trust me. The feedback for this might get a *little* out of hand.
**Note:** Feedback for classes that are rolled from before Limited-Feedback **will** receive feedback.
## Journals
* PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone
## Classlist
**King** **(20% [COLOR=steblue]Good[/COLOR], 20% [COLOR=PURPLE]Evil[/COLOR]/[COLOR=DARKRED]Devout[/COLOR], 20% Cowardly, 20% [COLOR=GREY]Random Neutral[/COLOR], 20% [COLOR=RED]Ps[/COLOR][COLOR=ORANGE]y[/COLOR][COLOR=YELLOW]c[/COLOR][COLOR=GREEN]ho[/COLOR][COLOR=LIGHBLUE]pa[/COLOR][COLOR=BLUE]th[/COLOR][COLOR=PURPLE]ic[/COLOR])** [COLOR=PURPLE]**Mastermind**[/COLOR]/[COLOR=DARKRED]**Cult Leader**[/COLOR] [COLOR=PURPLE]**Random Unseen Killer**[/COLOR]/[COLOR=DARKRED]**Random Cult**[/COLOR] [COLOR=STEBLUE]**Prince**[/COLOR] [COLOR=STEBLUE]**Random Blue Dragon**[/COLOR] [COLOR=STEBLUE]**Random Blue Dragon**[/COLOR] [COLOR=STEBLUE]**Random Blue Dragon**[/COLOR] [COLOR=STEBLUE]**Random Blue Dragon**[/COLOR] [COLOR=STEBLUE]**Random Blue Dragon**[/COLOR] [COLOR=STEBLUE]**Random Blue Dragon**[/COLOR] [COLOR=STEBLUE]**Random Blue Dragon**[/COLOR] [COLOR=STEBLUE]**Random Blue Dragon**[/COLOR] [COLOR=STEBLUE]**Random Blue Dragon**[/COLOR] [COLOR=STEBLUE]**Random Blue Dragon**[/COLOR] / [COLOR=DARKGREY]**Random Neutral Non-Killer**[/COLOR] [COLOR=DARKGREY]**Random Neutral Non-Killer**[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREY]**Neutral Killer**[/COLOR] If Psychopathic King rolls, this slot will be changed to **Any**.
# Playerlist
1. ~~KyoDaz~~ Executed D3. [COLOR=STEBLUE]**The Sheriff**[/COLOR] 2. Arete :crown: 3. ~~Priestess~~ Killed N2. [COLOR=STEBLUE]**The Squire**[/COLOR] 4. Magnus 5. Solic 6. ~~JakeTheWolfie~~ Killed N2. [COLOR=STEBLUE]**The Butler**[/COLOR] 7. ~~Luxy~~ -> Shurian 8. ~~SirDerpsAlot~~ Killed N2. [COLOR=STEBLUE]**The Drunk**[/COLOR] 9. ~~Marshal~~ Executed D2. [color=PURPLE]**The Mastermind**[/color] 10. BlueStorm 11. ~~SoulShade~~ Killed N3. [color=steblue]**The Observer**[/color] 12. ~~PokemonKidRyan~~ Killed N3. [color=steblue]**The Prince**[/color] 13. ~~Vulgard~~ Killed N2. [COLOR=STEBLUE]**The Maid**[/COLOR] 14. ~~Maxwell~~ -> ~~DatBird~~ Executed D4. [color=purple]**The Mastermind**[/color] 15. ~~PoisonedSquid~~ Killed N3. [color=purple]**The Assassin**[/color] 16. Teleology
# Backups: 1. Ozzkozz 2. Hja
## Notes That Should Be Read: * For the classes that are rolled, they can be rolled from any time period, I could roll a Maid from August 2017 forsay, and that will be the class a player recieves, then I could also roll a Maid from August 2019, and that will be the class another person recieves. And so on. * Full Feedback exists for classes rolled before July 16th, 2018, the rest of the classes will have Limited-Feedback * Trials existence will be determined by a roll. * The Kings roll has changed. Might want to look at the chances now. * Basic Explaination of Rolls: All classes will and can be rolled, and they can be rolled from any time period.
# OP May be changed at any time during Sign-Up Phase, you will be informed if it is.
# Classcard Thread: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998

I believe Magnus was replying to Geyde during this conversation

Magnus:

Someone should make a Light Vs Dark themed fm.

Geyde:

This discussion could have been much better handled privately™

And then Magnus asks why it should be handled privately when it’s a light-themed fm.

You’re not a Mod anymore, so you can’t judge meh

I’m a mod and a judge, does that help

I think what Geyde means is:
Maxwell and Wazza, if you have problems with queue etc. please feel free to come privately to the responsible people for that.
(So we can avoid any kind of unnecessary bad feelings on either side)

Read full topic
